ISO8583 Bitmap set/unset by XPath

Set/Clear bits for ISO8583 Bits group
Field 1Field 2Field 3Field 4
Bit 3Bit 2Bit 1Bit 0
Clear bit
Set bit

Unpacked > unpacked



Unpacked > uncompressed

Bit#XPath expression
1
2
3
4

Uncompressed > unpacked

Note: because XPath does not have bitwise operators, so it is difficult to write an expression to set or unset a specific bit from an input value.
This tool let you make ISO8583 Bitmap manipulation by xpath expression which utilizes fn:translate()/fn:substring() for one BCD (4 bits = 1 hex) or uncompressed (binary string 01010).
If you don't like $input, please enter another variable name in the text box.
@Thach Anh.
